website_summaries.verdict: The Footjoy Fury claims and boasts of all-around comfort and performance, and that what it serves on the turf. Golfers are quick to second the motion of this statement.The shoe's midsole may be the headliner, but other details like craftsmanship, weight, and outsole, were all features that helped improve performance.
pros: The majority of consumers recommend the Footjoy Fury because of its unmatched comfort that lasts throughout the day
Several reviewers compliment the thick cushy midsole
It wraps and molds to the foot
These spiked golf shoes not only provide unbeatable traction, but they are also easy to place
The foundation of the shoe delivers excellent stability, says a few testers
A couple of users are delighted with their purchase because it is lightweight
Based on the first feel of this Footjoy golf shoe, it seems that it is of great quality, says some individuals
cons: A small number of users complain about the noise that it makes when walking
Numerous customers are disappointed that the waterproofing faded quickly

customer_reviews.title: PPeerrffeecctt
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, most comfortable I have ever head in 40 years of golfing. Big plus that they are very light weight reducing fatigue. Kind of sneakerish looking but who cares? This my second pair for my Myrtle Beach home. Never considered anything else.
customer_reviews.author: BobfromCT

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I had been told they were the most comfortable golf shoes and I have been wearing Sketchers which were extremely comfortable but the soft nubs on the sketchers have worn down quickly so I thought I would try the Fury’s even though a little pricey. They are super comfortable no breaking in necessary. I believe much better constructed than the sketchers. I would highly recommend and am trying to figure out how to convince my wife to let me buy another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Walking on air
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these shoes when golfing. He is not an easy fit as he has big wide feet. These shoes fit him comfortably with no break-in time. He says wearing them is like walking on air.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Heidinger

customer_reviews.title: Better than most
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is perfect but these shoes are comfortable (after one round). Nice styling and color. Great traction from cleat placement design. Cool in warm weather. Don't step in a puddle, not waterproof, but they are not intended to be.
customer_reviews.author: Far West

customer_reviews.title: Not the best Foot Joy golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have worn Foot Joy golf shoes for many years. The ones I have had in the past were always comfortable out of the box. These were not and I kept expecting they would get better as they "broke in". They have not gotten better and in top of that make an annoying "clip clop" sound as I walk. The style is good but I would not buy these shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These golf shoes were comfortable right out of the box and they are waterproof. These were the two qualities I was most interested in. In addition, I'm a size 9 and that is what I ordered and they fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy H.

customer_reviews.title: Good golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my dad. He says the are good and fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Katie V.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Best golf shoes I have ever worn- at least so far. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Excessive Shipping and Handling
customer_reviews.text: The FL Fury golf shoes are very comfortable and what expected. The shipping and handling fee of $45.99 was excessive. It stated shipping and handling to Canada was $45.99 so I assumed this included any Custom fee and any taxes but I was surprised to have to pay an additional $38.00. If you are Cdn, I suggest you buy the product at local pro shop to avoid excessive shipping and handling fee. Les Connolly
customer_reviews.author: Les Connolly

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable shoes, great traction, water proof, great snug fit, no break in needed for me.
customer_reviews.author: cptpapa

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Worn once. Give good grip and very comfortable. If you're in between size wise, I would recommend to go smaller.
customer_reviews.author: kevin harris

customer_reviews.title: Good and comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: The shoe has a pointy nose and my toes were cramped and have rubbing marks as well. I walk 18 holes when I play the shoes performed well no sourness after the round. But the pointy nose kill these shoes. Foot joy please make these shoes less pointy and more round.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Cumba

customer_reviews.title: Great golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Just received these about 2 weeks ago, have worn them on the course twice now, They may be the most comfortable shoe i have worn. The fit is great, i am a 13 normally but in the Footjoys i got the 13w and there perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: jkodko

customer_reviews.title: Great support for your swing
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional construction with orthotic inner sole and internal sock. Very comfortable. Dry. Excellent traction with replaceable cleats.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M. E. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent comfortable golf shoes.
customer_reviews.text: The shows have good style, fit well are comfortable to walk in while playing 18 holes of golf carrying clubs. They have shown to be water proof and provide good grip to ground.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Platte

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable golf shoe ever.
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoe I ever had. Feels great right out of the box. Great grip - 9 cleats on each show so there is no slippage. You can’t go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: these shoes are perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, these are the most comfortable golf shoes I've ever worn, thankyou very much
customer_reviews.author: BLH

customer_reviews.title: Fury equals comfort and stability.
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoe I have ever worn. Actually have 3 different colors. Cannot go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ikenberry

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and stable platform.
customer_reviews.text: Finding a narrow golf shoe that fits like a sneaker is hard to do. Thankfully FootJoy continues to offer narrow sizes in almost all of their offerings. This shoe did 18 holes walking right our of the box with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: golfer1

customer_reviews.title: Already lost a spike on just my second wear
customer_reviews.text: Just bought these shoes and have only worn them twice. Noticed after my second round with them that they were already missing a spike. I'd expect a $130 shoe to retain its spikes for significantly longer.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Szajdecki

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit perfect. They are very comfortable. I have 2 pairs
customer_reviews.author: David Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, comfortable golf shoes.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fit and comfort. Lightweight and has a color combination that I liked (charcoal with lime green accent).
customer_reviews.author: Mike Stenson

customer_reviews.title: terrible...less than one star
customer_reviews.text: these are the worst golf shoes I've ever owned...pitiful to walk in...very uncomfortable..and actually hurt my feet to wear...I'd rate them less than one star
customer_reviews.author: JOHN GILLESPIE

customer_reviews.title: great look and excellent comfort
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn them 3 times, but they're great! I love the look and they're extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: John Camelin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: As usual, when I buy FootJoy golf shoes, I can wear them right away without any "break-in" period.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loose fit!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits too loose and my foot slides around during a golf swing. Can I return them?
customer_reviews.author: Corky Pond

customer_reviews.title: Box received in horrible condition
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was fine but the box for the shoes look like it was used. Damaged and stickers were removed. Horrible presentation for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit well. Heel slipped when I walked. Might try another size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foot Joy Flury orthodics
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable Golf shoes I have ever owned worth the money
customer_reviews.author: David Boucher

customer_reviews.title: VER COMFORTABLE RIGHT OUT OF THE BOX
customer_reviews.text: VERY SOFT INNERSOLE. GOOD TRACTION ON DAMP OR WET TURF. WATERPROOF.
customer_reviews.author: David I Levine

customer_reviews.title: Very Narrow at the toe
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the same size as all my other Footjoys but these slip at the heel and are extremely narrow at the toe.
customer_reviews.author: seektruth

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe at a great price. A little narrow, had to get a wide to give me room in the front and long the top.
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: true fit
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoe I've ever worn. Liked them so much ordered same pair in black
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable golf shoe I have ever owned. Fit is as expected but I probably should have gotten a narrow widthinstard of medium. Maybe the shoes run a bit wider than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Weberockin

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable golf shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable golf shoe. Worn just one round to date, but seems very stable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent B.

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. Made well. A little narrow at the top of the foot. Hopefully they will loosen up with more wear.
customer_reviews.author: roland keh

product_meta.title: Footjoy Men's Fury Golf Shoes
feature_bullets: TOUR-PROVEN - Tour players have made the switch to incorporate FJ FURY in practice and in play at tournaments around the world.
ALL-AROUND COMFORT - FJ FURYs athletic inspired upper features a full grain leather and engineered mesh upper providing breathability and waterproof protection.
DUAL DENSITY FOAM - FJ FURY generates custom comfort with an Ortholite Impressions Fit Bed, comprised of two densities of foam

PRECISION FIT - Inside the shoe is a soft, stretch, one-piece Inner Fit Sleeve lasted underneath the insole Board to provide a secure fit with no tongue slippage, enveloping the foot in comfort and control.
International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
